languages.text: {n}Инцендия Чорда властным движением привлекает к себе внимание.{/n} "{name} фон Валанциус. В темный час лишь трус и еретик страшится смотреть в лицо смерти. Я хочу присоединиться к твоему крестовому походу за пределы известного космоса. Дозволишь ли ты встать под знамена твоего отряда?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Инцендия Чорда властным движением привлекает к себе внимание.{/n} "{name} фон Валанциус. В темный час лишь трус и еретик страшится смотреть в лицо смерти. Я хочу присоединиться к твоему крестовому походу за пределы известного космоса. Дозволишь ли ты встать под знамена твоего отряда?"
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

languages.text: {n}Incendia Chorda calls for attention with an imperious gesture.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. When the hour is dark, only a coward and a heretic will not dare to look death in the face. I would like to join your crusade beyond the boundaries of the known universe. Will you allow me to do battle under your banner?"
languages.original_text: {n}Инцендия Чорда властным движением привлекает к себе внимание.{/n} "{name} фон Валанциус. В темный час лишь трус и еретик страшится смотреть в лицо смерти. Я хочу присоединиться к твоему крестовому походу за пределы известного космоса. Дозволишь ли ты встать под знамена твоего отряда?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia Chorda calls for attention with an imperious gesture.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. When the hour is dark, only a coward and heretic will not dare look death in the face. I would like to join your crusade beyond the boundaries of the known universe. Will you allow me to rally to your troops' banner?"
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia Chorda calls for attention with an imperious gesture.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. When the hour is dark, only a coward and heretic will not dare look death in the face. traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia Chorda calls for attention with an imperious gesture.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. When the hour is dark, only a coward and a heretic will not dare to look death in the face. I would like to join your crusade beyond the boundaries of the known universe. Will you allow me to do battle under your banner?"
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

languages.text: {n}Incendia Chorda requiere tu atención con un gesto imperioso.{/n} «{name} von Valancius. En la hora más aciaga, solo un cobarde y un hereje se atrevería a no mirar a la muerte a la cara. Quisiera unirme a su cruzada más allá de los límites del universo conocido. ¿Me permitirá acudir a la batalla bajo su estandarte?».
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia Chorda calls for attention with an imperious gesture.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. When the hour is dark, only a coward and a heretic will not dare to look death in the face. I would like to join your crusade beyond the boundaries of the known universe. Will you allow me to do battle under your banner?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia Chorda requiere tu atención con un gesto imperioso.{/n} «{name} von Valancius. En la hora más aciaga, solo un cobarde y un hereje se atrevería a no mirar a la muerte a la cara. Quisiera unirme a su cruzada más allá de los límites del universo conocido. ¿Me permitirá acudir a la batalla bajo su estandarte?».
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅以不容置疑的专横姿态吸引了所有人的注意。{/n}“{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，在这至暗时刻，只有懦夫和异端分子才会打算逃命。我想加入你的远征，前往已知宇宙的边界之外。你愿意让我在你的麾下作战吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia Chorda calls for attention with an imperious gesture.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. When the hour is dark, only a coward and a heretic will not dare to look death in the face. I would like to join your crusade beyond the boundaries of the known universe. Will you allow me to do battle under your banner?"

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅以不容置疑的专横姿态吸引了所有人的注意。{/n}“{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，在这至暗时刻，只有懦夫和异端分子才会打算逃命。我想加入你的远征，前往已知宇宙的边界之外。你愿意让我在你的麾下作战吗？”
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

languages.text: {n}Incendia Chorda attire votre attention d'un geste impérieux.{/n} « {name} von Valancius. Quand l'heure est grave, seuls les lâches et les hérétiques n'osent pas regarder la mort en face. J'aimerais me joindre à votre croisade par-delà les frontières de l'univers connu. Me permettrez-vous de combattre sous votre bannière ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia Chorda calls for attention with an imperious gesture.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. When the hour is dark, only a coward and a heretic will not dare to look death in the face. I would like to join your crusade beyond the boundaries of the known universe. Will you allow me to do battle under your banner?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia Chorda attire votre attention d'un geste impérieux.{/n} « {name} von Valancius. Quand l'heure est grave, seuls les lâches et les hérétiques n'osent pas regarder la mort en face. J'aimerais me joindre à votre croisade par-delà les frontières de l'univers connu. Me permettrez-vous de combattre sous votre bannière ? »
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

languages.text: {n}インセンディア・チョーダが威圧的な身振りで注意を促した。{/n}「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。時が暗くなったとき、死を直視する勇気がないのは臆病者と異端者だけだ。私は既知の宇宙の境界を越えて、あなたの聖戦に加わりたい。あなたの旗の下で戦わせてはもらえないだろうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia Chorda calls for attention with an imperious gesture.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. When the hour is dark, only a coward and a heretic will not dare to look death in the face. I would like to join your crusade beyond the boundaries of the known universe. Will you allow me to do battle under your banner?"

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディア・チョーダが威圧的な身振りで注意を促した。{/n}「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。時が暗くなったとき、死を直視する勇気がないのは臆病者と異端者だけだ。私は既知の宇宙の境界を越えて、あなたの聖戦に加わりたい。あなたの旗の下で戦わせてはもらえないだろうか？」
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

languages.text: {n}Incendia Chorda fordert mit einer gebieterischen Geste deine Aufmerksamkeit.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. Wenn die Stunde dunkel ist, wagt es nur ein Feigling und Ketzer nicht, dem Tod ins Gesicht zu blicken. Ich möchte mich Eurem Kreuzzug über die Grenzen des bekannten Universums hinaus anschließen. Gestattet Ihr mir, unter Eurem Banner zu kämpfen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia Chorda calls for attention with an imperious gesture.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. When the hour is dark, only a coward and a heretic will not dare to look death in the face. I would like to join your crusade beyond the boundaries of the known universe. Will you allow me to do battle under your banner?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia Chorda fordert mit einer gebieterischen Geste deine Aufmerksamkeit.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. Wenn die Stunde dunkel ist, wagt es nur ein Feigling und Ketzer nicht, dem Tod ins Gesicht zu blicken. Ich möchte mich Eurem Kreuzzug über die Grenzen des bekannten Universums hinaus anschließen. Gestattet Ihr mir, unter Eurem Banner zu kämpfen?"
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

languages.text: {n}İncendia Chorda, otoriter bir hareketle dikkat çekmeye çalışıyor.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. Kötü zamanlar kapıyı çaldığında yalnızca korkaklar ve kâfirler ölümün yüzüne bakamaz. Bilinen evrenin sınırları ötesindeki cihadına katılmak isterim. Sancağın altında savaşmama izin verecek misin?"
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia Chorda calls for attention with an imperious gesture.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. When the hour is dark, only a coward and a heretic will not dare to look death in the face. I would like to join your crusade beyond the boundaries of the known universe. Will you allow me to do battle under your banner?"

traits.locale_text: {n}İncendia Chorda, otoriter bir hareketle dikkat çekmeye çalışıyor.{/n} "{name} von Valancius. Kötü zamanlar kapıyı çaldığında yalnızca korkaklar ve kâfirler ölümün yüzüne bakamazlar. Bilinen evrenin sınırları ötesindeki cihadınıza katılmak isterim. Sancağının altında savaşmama izin verecek misin?"
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion
